# Steve Sundberg

### Ward II - Mayor Pro Tem

**303.525.6659** (mobile)  
**Email:**[Steve.Sundberg@auroragov.org](mailto:Steve.Sundberg@auroragov.org)  
**Term Expires:** November 2025

**Profession:**Steve operates a popular local family owned bar and grill, with 26 employees.

**Council Policy Committees (2025):**The Mayor Pro Tem assigns council members to policy committees and sits on the Council Appointee Evaluation Committee

**Community/Intergovernmental:**Board Member, Leadership Aurora; Culinary Advisory Board Member and Marketing/Hospitality Board Member, Pickens Technical College Culinary; Court Appointment Special Advocate (CASA), Advocates for Children
